doc.field: New-York Historical Society collection accession registers
New-York Historical Society collection accession registers

The 1862-1863 entries include only acquisitions made through the Grosvenor, Demilt and Thomas Funds. For entries from 1871 to the end of the register, the preprinted heading of the inside pages reads "Catalogue of Additions," however the first page's heading was manually altered to read "Catalogue of Donations." It is not certain when purchases begin to be recorded; the earliest found during processing was dated March 1879. Bound by N-YHS July 2, 1936.
New-York Historical Society collection accession registers
